header.gameNote: PATRIOT LEAGUE TR AT WORCESTER MA

article.headline: Lehigh 48, Colgate 44
article.story: WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) -- Bryan White scored 13 points, including two free throws in the final two seconds, as Lehigh defeated Colgate, 48-44 in the first round of the Patriot League Tournament. No. 3 seed Lehigh (19-11) will play the winner of the game between second seed Holy Cross and seventh seed Navy on Sunday. Jon Simon had 10 points to lead No. 6 seeded Colgate (10-19), playing without leading scorer Kyle Roemer, who suffered a concussion Feb. 18 against Navy. The game was tied 23-23 at the half. Colgate's Marc Daniels then scored 5 points to give the Raiders a 33-31 lead. Jose Olivero's free throw gave Lehigh a 1-point lead and ignited a 13-2 run over the next 7:42. Olivero's 3-point goal gave Lehigh its largest lead at 46-36 with 6:40 left. Colgate answered with eight consecutive points, forcing Lehigh to miss five shots and commit three turnovers to narrow the lead to 46-44 with :43 seconds remaining. Lehigh led through much of the first half, but Kyle Chones and Jon Simon each had 3-pointers to spark an 11-2 run for a 23-18 lead with 5:38 left. Mike Fischman then scored 4 points as Lehigh tied it at halftime.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
